title: Sampler, 1751
medium:
Medium: silk embroidery, wool foundation
Technique: cross and counted satin stitches on plain weave
signed: "Elizabeth Gouger her work in the XI year of her age 1751."
inscribed: "Elizabeth Gouger her work in the XI year of her age 1751."
provenance: ex. coll. Mrs. Henry E. Coe (Eva Johnston Coe)
dimensions: Warp x Weft: 47 x 33 cm (18 1/2 x 13 in.)
creditline: Bequest of Mrs. Henry E. Coe
description: The Lord's Prayer, baskets of flowers with birds, and signature "Elizabeth Gouger her work in the XI year of her age 1751." Floral border.
